attributes.additional_details: We are a nation of animal lovers yet we find it acceptable to watch our pets, shivering, cowering in the corners on F works night. Come on please prove it and make all fireworks silent as they do in Italy.
attributes.background: Make all fireworks silent to alleviate animal suffering. Those with PTS also suffer badly. Organised displays only , do not sell to the public

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758

While some fireworks are marketed as silent, these still make some noise. If you would like the Government to reduce the decibel limit to a specific level, you could start a new petition requesting this.
